settings.description:
This smart superfood was formulated by Dr. Sarah
Rahal, a double-board certified pediatric
neurologist, to help us all feel better.

settings.title: WHY ETERNA ?
settings.heading:
ETERNA is your
body’s armor.
settings.describe1:
Colostrum – otherwise known as “liquid gold” – is the dairy superfood
that contains all the nutrients our bodies need to thrive.
settings.describe2: ARMRA️ uses proprietary Cold-Chain BioPotent™ Technology to preserve 400+ functional nutrients in their most pure and bioavailable form.

settings.description:
ARMRA️ is the brainchild of Dr. Sarah Rahal, MD, a double board-
certified pediatric neurologist with expertise in environmental
and functional medicine.

After years of research and development, Dr. Rahal launched
ARMRA️ with a mission to minimize the modern environmental
impact on human health.

Her goal was to create a single product that tackled more issues
with fewer supplements.
